answers.author: Nikiah Nudell
answers.text:
Hi Greg - do you have any more info about the member? size? municipal, non-profit, fire based, third service, etc? size of fleet? Happy to help with a little more info. Cheers, Nick

author: Gregory Stopka
text:
I have a member that would like to know when he should purchase new ambulances based on the “true cost” of owning one.  I have created a short survey to help answer these questions:
https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/39PL3B6 
I will share the results in this comment field.  Please provide as much information as you can.  You help is greatly appreciated.
Thanks,
Greg Stopka
Central Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
title: When to Replace an Ambulance?
